job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Cushion is looking for a stellar Machine Learning Engineer to join us during this exciting phase of the companyltbrgtltbrgtWere growing generating revenue and announced our 28M Seed round on TechCrunch in 2019 In addition we have been recognized by SXSW Bloomberg American Banker Inc magazine and moreltbrgtltbrgtThis is a rare opportunity to join a startup as one of the first 20 employees and shape the product strategy and culture alongside the Founder and core teamltbrgtltbrgtWho were looking forltbrgtltbrgtThe core of what were building at Cushion is a system that can perform intelligent financial actions on behalf of a consumer better than they canltbrgtltbrgtWe are on the hunt to find a humble hardworking ML Engineer who is an outstanding engineer first and foremost eg can build and deploy a web app from scratch if need be This person must be able to not only extract insights from data and build ML models but is also able to deploy their models into production without the help of other engineersltbrgtltbrgtThe ideal candidate is curious driven absolutely loves solving complex problems is a pleasure to be around and work with and has an intense bias towards making stuff happenltbrgtltbrgtAs an engineer at Cushion you willltbrgtltulgtltligt have serious ownership  of the work that you do as well as your stake in the companyltligtltligt work in a fastpaced environment where an idea on Monday can become a live feature in the hands of users by Fridayltligtltligt work on highimpact initiatives that will affect tens of thousands of customers hopefully millions as we growltligtltligt be a major contributor in building and scaling a companyltbrgtltligtltulgtWhat were looking forltbrgtltbrgtBased on our experience building teams at multiple companies including Twitter were looking for candidates with the following backgroundltbrgtltulgtltligtA college degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering Math or PhysicsltligtltligtAt least 4 years of fulltime Software Engineering experience after getting your undergraduate degreeltligtltligtAt least 2 years of Machine Learning experienceltligtltligtA track record of deploying ML models into production yourselfltligtltligtExperience with AI NLP MLltligtltligtExperience with PythonltligtltligtExperience with relational databases and SQLltligtltligtExperience deploying applications on AWS Google Cloud Azure etcltligtltligtBonus Prior startup experienceltligtltligtBonus Masters Degree or higher in Machine LearningltbrgtltligtltulgtThe salary range for this position is 120000  180000ltbrgtltbrgt
